name: retrieveApplications
description: You use a `GET` request to retrieve details of all applications associated with your account.

api_key.description: You can find your API key in your [account overview](https://dashboard.nexmo.com/account-overview)

api_secret.description: You can find your API secret in your [account overview](https://dashboard.nexmo.com/account-overview)

page_size.description: Set the number of items returned on each call to this endpoint. The default is 10 records.

page_index.description: Set the offset from the first page. The default value is `0`.

$ul: **applications**: The collection of your applications. Each object contains information about an an individual application. The public_key is not included in the application information.
**_links**: A series of links between resources in this API in the following [HAL specification](http://stateless.co/hal_specification.html).
**count**: The number of items associated with your account.
**page_index**: The offset from the first page.
**page_size**: The number of items returned on each call to this endpoint. The default is 10 records.
